entry.title: Monday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 09 January 2023
